captions.text: Hello, we are Block B

Because it's cool.
He saw it in his dreams

I was dreaming and we were 
pirates in it

We were on the boat and Zico 
was like the captain on it

U-KWON was lying down, TAEIL
and JAEHYO were playing together

But the funny thing was 
Park Kyung wasn't in it
I had a dream falling off a cliff
That means you're growing

Everywhere looked really nice 
at Vietnam, including the buildings

It has grand atmosphere and also
a very pretty country at the same time

So we went there and filmed it.
It was a lot of fun

I think this time it was 
Zico

He was weird at the scene 
where he was looking at the jewel

To tell you something, I am 
Inha university theater major
It's important to focus

I am the night's wanderer,
punk!!
You were spitting...

We took one side out since 
he couldn't see well
I couldn't see

It's our life, we don't want 
to but we keep doing it
One two three
Look at him
Our fan club name is BBC
All of our BBC are my dream girls

Raise your hand if you 
like older girls!

Raise your hand if you 
like girls of same age

Raise your hand if you 
like younger girls

I rapped with my heartbeat 
in my mom's belly

Dog, eagle, cheetah, wolf 
leopard, jaguar
I think you want to buy a car
TAEIL does the most housework

They don't know how to clean up.
Throw, break... everything
I can't do this
I have you in here
This was ASK IN A BOX: BLOCK B
